1. I am a retired professor from Zakir Husain College, Delhi

guru of my father visited our house in Calcutta for a month. He
carried a palm-leaf manuscript of this Bhojavṛtti in the
Devanāgarī script, which must have been very old. He reluctantly
allowed me to copy it out in my notebooks, which I did in a
week. He had it checked through a friend of my father. The notes
remained there for 40 years, until I rediscovered them in 1995.
The pages had become yellowish and brittle with age, and were in

In the course of 15 years, I typed out the handwritten pages and
compared the material with materials in libraries in Delhi. I
found many alternative expressions, some justifiable, some not.
I noted down those which could be accepted. You will find them
in my vṛttis inserted in square brackets with pa0, meaning
pāṭhāntara. Even in some sūtras there are different readings,
which I have pointed out there.

that this text does not contain any European punctuation marks

<item>1. In India when we donate something, -- the exact word is daana,
--- we lose all rights to it. The Bhojavṛtti I sent to you is your
property now, and you will use it as you please. </item>
<item>2. In India, the tradition is that, at some time in our life, we
become initiated to the sprirituality through a spiritual master
(guru). The best gurus are mendicant sannyāsīs, who are constantly
moving on foot, staying at a town not more than three months. They
usually avoid contact with society and stay at temples, etc. They do
not have any address, but through his disciples scattered all over
India some rumour would float that he left Pune last month and his
whereabouts are now not known. In 1955, when I was a 15-year-old
boy, this much I knew: that the manuscript this Hindi-speaking sādhu
was carrying was something valuable. Sanskrit was taught at my
school and my Sanskrit Paṇḍit told me that it would be better if I
could keep a copy of it. The matter was in 4 volumes, each with two
wooden covers and two holes to bind them together. He was possibly
carrying it from one Gurukul (Traditional Vedic School) to another.
That was why HE WAS RELUCTANT to allow me to touch it because I was
then ignorant of the subject. Such gurus give up even their names,
and assume a name ending with -ānanda (bliss). They are known by the
succession of disciples, and people refer to them as a disciple of
so and so. Later, I came to Delhi for higher studies and started
teaching in Delhi University. I had my own guru, who is no more in
the body. These days such gurus are rare. They did not have any
property or address, walked barefoot constantly, suddenly appearing
where big congregations or yajñas were held, giving initiation
(dīkṣā) to a few unknown people, and travelling in the company of a
few recluse disciples. They did not have any worry for procuring
food. In the afternoon they would come down to the locality where
people would give them alms in rice, āṭā (wheat powder) and potato.
They would go back to their shelter, cook it with wooden fire and
take a few morsels without salt. Even these days millions of such
sādhus exist but they do not come to the locality any more. ---
Instead a modern sort of religious people have emerged, who are
making money for their speeches, have built big Ashrams and are
imparting wrong information. Yoga has become some sort of physical

pradarśanaṃ yat tasyotkarṣeṇottare dve bhūmī yogopayoginyāviti|
yoga ityuktaṃ bhavati| ekāgre bahirvṛttinirodhaḥ| niruddhe ca sarvāsāṃ
vṛttināṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ ca pravilaya ityanayoreva bhūmyoryogasya
vṛttiḥ --- draṣṭuḥ puruṣasya tasmin kāle svarūpe cinmātratāyāmavasthānaṃ
vṛttiḥ --- itaratra yogādanyasmin kāle vṛttayo yā vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇāstābhiḥ
sārūpyaṃ tadrūpatvam| ayamarthaḥ --- yādṛśyo vṛttayaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmikāḥ
prādurbhavanti tādṛgrūpa eva saṃvedyate vyavahartṛbhiḥ puruṣaḥ| tadevaṃ
yasminnekāgratayā pariṇate citiśakteḥ svasmin rūpe pratiṣṭhānaṃ bhavati
paribhāvyate| yathā jalataraṅgeṣu calatsu candraścalanniva pratibhāṣate
bhavati --- pañca vṛttayaḥ kīdṛśyaḥ| kliṣṭā akliṣṭāḥ|
gatatvāllakṣaṇasya pṛthak lakṣaṇaṃ na kṛtam| pramāṇalakṣaṇantu ---
śuktikāyāṃ rajatajñānam| atadrūpapratiṣṭhamiti| tasyārthasya yadrūpaṃ tasmin
rūpe na pratiṣṭhati tasyārthasya yat pāramārthikaṃ rūpaṃ na tat
vṛttiḥ --- śabdajanitaṃ jñānaṃ śabdajñānaṃ| tadanupatituṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ
ityucyate| yathā puruṣasya caitanyaṃ svarūpamiti| atra devadattasya kambala
iti śabdajanite jñāne ṣaṣṭhyā yo+adhyavasito bhedastamihāvidyamānamapi
vṛttiḥ --- abhāvapratyaya ālambanaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā| etaduktaṃ bhavati ---
yā santatamudriktatvāttamasaḥ samastaviṣayaparityāgena pravartate vṛttiḥ sā
buddhāvārohaḥ sā smṛtiḥ| tatra pramāṇaviparyayavikalpā jāgradavasthāḥ| tā
prakāśapravṛttiniyamarūpā yā vṛttayastāsāṃ nirodho bhavatītyuktaṃ bhavati|
yatna utsāhaḥ punaḥpunastathātvena cetasi niveśanamabhyāsa ityucyate
vṛttiḥ --- dvividho hi viṣayo dṛṣṭa ānuśravikaśca| dṛṣṭa ihaivopalabhyamānaḥ
vṛttiḥ --- tadvairāgyaṃ paraṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ prathamaṃ vairāgyaṃ viṣayaviṣayaṃ
prakarṣeṇa jñāyate bhāvyasya rūpaṃ yena sa samprajñātaḥ
savicāraḥ sānandaḥ sāsmitaśca| bhāvanā bhāvyasya viṣayāntaraparihāreṇa
cetasi punaḥpunarniveśanam| bhāvyaṃ ca dvividham --- īśvarastattvāni ca|
tānyapi dvividhāni jaḍājaḍabhedāt| jaḍāni caturviṃśatiḥ| ajaḍaḥ puruṣaḥ|
pūrvāparānusandhānena śabdārthollekhasambhedena ca bhāvanā kriyate tadā
deśakāladharmāvacchedena yadā bhāvanā tadā savicāraḥ| tasminnevāvalambane
vyapadiśyate| yadā tu rajastamoleśānuviddhamantaḥkaraṇasattvaṃ bhāvyate tadā
sānandaḥ samādhirbhavati| tasminneva samādhau ye baddhadhṛtayastattvāntaraṃ
sāsmita ityucyate| na cāhaṃkārāsmitayorabhedaḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ| yato
sā+asmitā| asminneva samādhau ye kṛtaparitoṣāḥ paraṃ paramātmānaṃ puruṣaṃ na
paśyanti teṣāṃ cetasi svakāraṇe layamupāgate prakṛtilayā ityucyante| ye
paraṃ puruṣaṃ jñātvā bhāvanāyāṃ pravartante teṣāmiyaṃ
pratyayaśceti virāmapratyayaḥ| tasyābhyāsaḥ paunaḥpunyena cetasi niveśanam|
tatra yā kācidvṛttirullasati tasyā neti netīti nairantaryeṇa paryudasanaṃ
kiñcidvedyam| asamprajñāto nirbījaḥ samādhiḥ| iha caturvidhaścittasya
pariṇāmaḥ --- vyutthānaṃ samādhiprārambha ekāgratā nirodhaśca| tatra
kṣiptamūḍhe cittabhūmī vyutthānam| vikṣiptā bhūmiḥ satvodrekāt
samādhiprārambhaḥ| niruddhaikāgrate ca paryantabhūmī| pratipariṇāmaṃ ca
saṃskārāḥ| tatra vyutthānajanitāḥ saṃskārāḥ samādhiprārambhajaiḥ saṃskāraiḥ
saṃskārāḥ svarūpaṃ ca hanyante| yathā suvarṇasaṃvalitaṃ dhmāyamānaṃ
sīsakamātmānaṃ suvarṇamalaṃ ca nirdahati| evamekāgratājanitān saṃskārān
teṣāṃ samādhirbhavapratyayaḥ| bhavaḥ saṃsāraḥ sa eva pratyayaḥ kāraṇaṃ yasya
sa bhavapratyayaḥ| ayamarthaḥ --- ādhimātrāntarbhūtā eva te saṃsāre
ca muktikāmena mahān yatno vidheya ityetadarthamupadiṣṭam ||19||
pūrve upāyā yasya sa śraddhādipūrvakaḥ| te ca śraddhādayaḥ
pratipadyante| tatra śraddhā yogaviṣaye cetasaḥ prasādaḥ| vīryamutsāhaḥ|
tatra śraddhāvato vīryaṃ jāyate yogaviṣaya utsāhavān bhavati| sotsāhasya ca
pāścātyāsu bhūmiṣu smṛtirutpadyate| tatsmaraṇācca cetaḥ samādhīyate|
samāhitacittaśca bhāvyaṃ samyagvivekena jānāti| ta ete samprajñātasya
vṛttiḥ --- samādhilābha iti śeṣaḥ| saṃvegaḥ kriyāheturdṛḍhataraḥ saṃskāraḥ|
sa tīvro yeṣāmadhimātropāyānāṃ teṣāmāsannaḥ samādhilābhaḥ samādhiphalaṃ
vṛttiḥ --- tebhya upāyebhyo mṛdvādibhedabhinnebhya upāyavatāṃ viśeṣo bhavati|
madhyasaṃvegastīvrasaṃvegaśca| adhimātra upāye tīvre saṃvege ca mahān yatnaḥ
īśvarasya praṇidhānāt samādhilābha ityuktam| tatreśvarasya svarūpaṃ pramāṇaṃ
prabhāvaṃ vācakamupāsanākramaṃ tatphalaṃ ca krameṇa vaktumāha ---
vihitaniṣiddhavyāmiśrarūpāṇi karmāṇi| vipacyanta iti vipākāḥ karmaphalāni
puruṣaviśeṣo+anyebhyaḥ puruṣebhyo viśiṣyate iti viśeṣa īśvaraḥ īśanaśīla
kleśādisparśo nāsti tathāpi cittagatāsteṣāmupadiśyante| yathā yoddhṛgato
jayaparājayau svāminaḥ| asya tu triṣvapi kāleṣu tathāvidho+api
kleśādiparāmarśo nāsti| ataḥ savilakṣaṇa eva bhagavānīśvaraḥ| tasya ca
parasparānapekṣatvāt| te dve jñānaiśvarye īśvarasattve vartamāne anādibhūte
prāṇināṃ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatayā pariṇataṃ cittaṃ nirmale sāttvike
naivamīśvarasya| tasya kevala eva sāttvikaḥ pariṇāma
puruṣāntaravilakṣaṇatayā sa eva īśvaraḥ| muktātmanāntu punaḥpunaḥ
tathāvidhatvānna muktātmatulyatvam| na ceśvarāṇāmanekatvam| teṣāṃ tulyatve
tat tatra niratiśayaṃ kāṣṭhāṃ prāptam| dṛṣṭā hyalpatvamahatvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ
kvacinniratiśayatāmāsādayanti| yatra caite niratiśayāḥ sa īśvaraḥ| yadyapi
śāstrādasya sarvajñatvādayo viśeṣā avagantavyāḥ| tasya svaprayojanābhāve
vṛttiḥ --- ādyānāṃ sraṣṭṝṇāṃ brahmādīnāmapi sa gururupadeṣṭā yataḥ sa kālena
stūyate+aneneti nauti stautīti vā praṇava oṃkāraḥ| tayośca
vācyavācakalakṣaṇaḥ sambandho nityaḥ saṃketena prakāśyate na tu kenacit
kriyate| yathā pitāputrayorvidyamāna eva sambandho+asyāyaṃ pitā+asyāyaṃ
tadvācyasya ceśvarasya bhāvanaṃ punaḥpunaścetasi niveśanamekāgratāyā upāyaḥ|
ataḥ samādhisiddhaye yoginā praṇavo japyastadartha īśvaraśca bhāvanīya
bhavati| viṣayaprātikūlyena svāntaḥkaraṇābhimukhamañcati yā cetanā dṛkśaktiḥ
sā pratyakcetanā tadadhigamo jñānaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ| antarāyā vakṣyamāṇāḥ|
ubhayakoṭyālambanaṃ jñānaṃ saṃśayaḥ --- yogaḥ sādhyo na veti|
cittasya tatrāpratiṣṭhā| ta ete samādherekāgratāyā yathāyogaṃ
tatra duḥkhaṃ cittasya rajasaḥ pariṇāmo bādhanālakṣaṇo yadbādhāt
vepathurāsanamanaḥsthairyasya bādhakaḥ| prāṇo yadbāhyaṃ vāyumācāmati sa
śvāsaḥ, yat kauṣṭhyaṃ vāyuṃ niḥśvasiti sa praśvāsaḥ| ete vikṣepaiḥ saha
vṛttiḥ --- maitrī sauhārdam| karuṇā kṛpā| muditā harṣaḥ| upekṣaudāsīnyam| etā
yathākramaṃ sukhiteṣu duḥkhiteṣu puṇyavatsvapuṇyavatsu ca vibhāvayet|
tathāhi --- sukhiteṣu sādhuṣu eṣāṃ sukhitvamiti maitrīṃ kuryānna tu īrṣyām|
duḥkhiteṣu kathaṃ nu nāmaiṣāṃ duḥkhanivṛttiḥ syāditi kṛpāmeva kuryānna
tāṭasthyam| puṇyavatsu puṇyānumodanena harṣameva kuryānna tu kimete
puṇyavanta iti vidveṣam| apuṇyavatsu caudāsīnyameva bhāvayennānumodanaṃ na
vā dveṣam| sūtre sukhaduḥkhādiśabdaistadvantaḥ pratipāditāḥ| tadevaṃ
maitryādiparikarmaṇā citte prasīdati sukhena samādherāvirbhāvo bhavati|
parikarma caitadbāhyaṃ karma| yathā gaṇite miśrakādivyavahāro
vikṣepamutpādayataḥ| tau cet samūlamunmūlitau syātāṃ tadā prasannatvānmanaso
vidhāraṇā| sā ca dvābhyāṃ prakārābhyāṃ bāhyasyābhyantarāpūraṇena pūritasya
vidyante phalatvena yasyāḥ sā viṣayavatī pravṛttirmanasaḥ sthairyaṃ karoti|
tathāhi nāsāgre cittaṃ dhārayato divyagandhasaṃvidupajāyate| tādṛśya eva
jihvāgre rasasaṃbit| tālvagre rūpasaṃvit| jihvāmadhye sparśasaṃvit|
divye jāyamānā saṃviccittasyaikāgratāyā heturbhavati| asti yogasya phalamiti
jyotiḥśabdena sāttvikaḥ prakāśa ucyate| sa praśasto bhūyānatiśayavāṃśca
vidyate yasyāḥ sā jyotiṣmatī pravṛttiḥ| viśokā vigataḥ
sukhamayasattvābhyāsavaśācchoko rajaḥpariṇāmo yasyāḥ sā viśokā cetasaḥ
bhoktṛtvamātmanaḥ sa svapnaḥ| nidrā pūrvoktalakṣaṇā| tadālambanaṃ
svapnālambanaṃ nidrālambanaṃ vā jñānamālambyamānaṃ cetasaḥ sthitiṃ karoti
nānārucitvāt prāṇināṃ yasmin kasmiṃścidvastuni yoginaḥ śraddhā bhavati| tasya
vṛttiḥ --- yathābhiprete vastuni bāhye candrādāvabhyantare nāḍicakrādau vā
kvacit paramāṇuparyante sūkṣme viṣaye+asya manaḥ pratihanyate ityarthaḥ|
ityuktaṃ tathāpi bhūmikākramavaśādgrāhyagrahaṇagrahītṛṣu iti bodhyam| yataḥ
sthūlasūkṣmagrāhyoparaktaṃ cittaṃ tatra samāpannaṃ bhavati| evaṃ grahaṇe
vṛttiḥ --- śrotrendiyagrāhyaḥ sphoṭarūpo vā śabdaḥ| artho jātyādiḥ| jñānaṃ
sattvapradhānā buddhivṛttiḥ| vikalpa uktalakṣaṇaḥ| taiḥ saṃkīrṇāḥ| yasyāmete
śabdādayastrayaḥ parasparādhyāsena vikalparūpeṇa pratibhāsante gauriti śabdo
gaurityartho gauriti jñānamityanenākāreṇa sā savitarkā samāpattirucyate
vṛttiḥ --- etayaiva savitarkayā nirvitarkayā ca samāpatyā savicārā nirvicārā
ca vyākhyātā| kīdṛśī| sūkṣmaviṣayā sūkṣmastanmātrendriyādirviṣayo yasyāḥ sā
tathoktā| etena pūrvasyāḥ sthūlaviṣayatvaṃ pratipāditaṃ bhavati| sā hi
deśakāladharmādyavacchinnaḥ sūkṣmo+arthaḥ pratibhāti yasyāṃ sā savicārā|
tadaliṅgaparyavasānam| na kvacillīyate na vā kiñcilliṅgati gamayatītyaliṅgaṃ
pradhānam| tatparyantaṃ sūkṣmaviṣayatvam| tathāhi --- guṇānāṃ pariṇāme
liṅgamātraṃ buddhiḥ| aliṅgam pradhānamiti| nātaḥ paraṃ sūkṣmamastītyuktaṃ
vṛttiḥ --- tā evoktalakṣanāḥ samāpattayaḥ sabījaḥ saha bījenālambanena
vartata iti sabījaḥ samprajñātaḥ samādhirucyate sarvāsāṃ sālambanatvāt
sthitipravāhayogyaṃ bhavati| etadeva cittasya vaiśāradyaṃ yat sthitau
vṛttiḥ --- ṛtaṃ satyaṃ vibharti kadācidapi na viparyayeṇācchādyate sā
ṛtambharā prajñā tasmin bhavatītyarthaḥ| tasmācca prajñālokāt sarvaṃ
yathāvat paśyan yogī prakṛṣṭaṃ yogaṃ prāpnoti ||48||
prajñā sā sāmānyaviṣayā| na hi śabdaliṅgayorindriyavadviśeṣapratipattau
sāmarthyam| iyaṃ punaḥ nirvicāravaiśāradyasamudbhavā prajñā tābhyāṃ
atastasyāmeva yoginā paraḥ prayatnaḥ kartavya ityupadiṣṭaṃ bhavati
vṛttiḥ --- tayā prajñayā janito yaḥ saṃskāraḥ so+anyān saṃskārān vyutthānajān
vṛttiḥ --- tasyāpi samprajñātasya nirodhe vilaye sati sarvāsāṃ cittavṛttīnāṃ
kāraṇe pravilayādyā saṃskāramātrādvṛttirudeti tasyāṃ neti neti kevalaṃ
paryudasanānnirbījaḥ samādhirbhavati yasmin sati puruṣaḥ svarūpaniṣṭhaḥ
tatphalāni ca nirṇīya cittavikṣepāṃstattatsahabhuvaśca duḥkhādīn vistareṇa
te te duṣprāpayogarddhisiddhaye yena darśitāḥ| upāyāḥ sa
praṇavapūrvāṇāṃ mantrāṇāṃ japaḥ| īśvarapranidhānaṃ sarvakriyāṇāṃ tasmin
paramagurau phalanirapekṣatayā samarpaṇam| etāni kriyāyoga ityucyate
sā+arthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasya sa tathoktaḥ| etaduktaṃ bhavati --- ete
paritāpamupajanayantaḥ kleśaśabdavācyā bhavanti| te hi cetasi pravartamānāḥ
vṛttiḥ --- avidyā moho+anātmanyātmābhimāna iti yāvat| sā kṣetraṃ
caturvidhānām| ato yatrāvidyā viparyayajñānarūpā śithilībhavati tatra
prabodhakābhāve svakāryaṃ nārabhante te prasuptā ityucyante| yathā
bālāvasthāyāṃ bālasya hi vāsanārūpāḥ sthitā api kleśāḥ
svakāryamārabdhumakṣamā yathā+abhyāsavato yoginaḥ| te vicchinnā ye
rāgāvasthāyāṃ vā dveṣaḥ| na hyanayoḥ parasparaviruddhayoryugapat
sambhavo+asti| te udārā ye prāptasahakārisannidhayaḥ svaṃ svaṃ
pratīyate| na hi kvacidapi kleśānāṃ viparyayānvayanirapekṣāṇāṃ
cittavikṣepakāritvādyoginā prathamameva taducchede yatnaḥ kārya iti
tatsādhaneṣvanabhilaṣato yo+ayaṃ nindātmakaḥ krodhaḥ sa dveṣalakṣaṇaḥ kleśaḥ
parihartavyāḥ| na cājñātānāṃ teṣāṃ parihāraḥ kartuṃ śakya iti tajjñānāya
teṣāmuddeśaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kṣetraṃ vibhāgaṃ cābhidhāya sthūlasūkṣmabhedabhinnānāṃ
vṛttiḥ --- te sukṣmāḥ kleśāḥ ye vāsanārūpeṇaiva sthitāḥ svavṛttirūpaṃ
pariṇāmaṃ nārabhante| te pratiprasavena pratilomapariṇāmena heyāstyaktavyāḥ|
svakāraṇe+asmitāyāṃ kṛtārthaṃ savāsanaṃ cittaṃ yadā praviṣṭaṃ bhavati tadā
vastrādau sthūlo malaḥ prakṣālanamātreṇaiva nivartate| yastatra sūkṣmāṃśaḥ
vṛttiḥ --- karmāśaya ityanena svarūpaṃ tasyābhihitam| ato vāsanārūpāṇyeva
karmāṇi| kleśamūla ityanena kāraṇamabhihitaṃ yataḥ karmaṇāṃ śubhāśubhānāṃ
kleśā eva nimittam| dṛṣṭādṛṣṭajanmavedanīya ityanena phalamuktam| asminneva
devatārādhanādīni tīvrasaṃvegena kṛtāni ihaiva janmani jātyāyurbhogalakṣaṇaṃ
janmani jātyādayo viśiṣṭāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ| evamanveṣāṃ viśvāmitrādīnāṃ
kuśalākuśalarūupāṇāṃ vipākaḥ phalaṃ jātyāyurbhogā bhavanti| jātirmanuṣyādiḥ|
karmavāsanā yathā yathā pākamupayānti tathā tathā guṇapradhānabhāvena sthitā
vṛttiḥ --- hlādaḥ sukhamṃ paritāpo duḥkhaṃ tau phalaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ|
puṇyaṃ kuśalaṃ karma tadviparītamapuṇyaṃ te karmaṇī kāraṇaṃ yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ
duḥkhatvam| guṇavṛttivirodhācceti| guṇānāṃ satvarajastamasāṃ yā vṛttayaḥ
tāsāṃ sarvatraiva duḥkhānuvedhād duḥkhatvam| etaduktaṃ bhavati ---
uktarūpakāraṇacatuṣṭayāḥ sarve viṣayā duḥkharūpatayā pratibhānti| tasmācca
tayoravivekakhyātipūrvako yo+asau saṃyogo bhoktṛbhogyatvena sannidhānaṃ sa
heyasya duḥkhasya guṇapariṇāmarūpasya saṃsārasya hetuḥ kāraṇam| tannivṛtyā
draṣṭṛdṛśyayoḥ saṃyoga ityuktam| tatra dṛśyasya svarūpaṃ kāryaṃ prayojanaṃ
vṛttiḥ --- prakāśaḥ sattvasya dharmaḥ| kriyā pravṛttirūpā rajasaḥ|
sthitirniyamarūpā tamasaḥ| tāḥ prakāśakriyāsthitayaḥ śīlaṃ svābhāvikaṃ rūpaṃ
bhūtāni sthūlasūkṣmabhedena dvividhāni pṛthivyādīni gandhatanmātrādīni ca|
viṣayoparaktāni vijñānāni tāni anu avyavadhānena pratisaṃkramādyabhāvena
vṛttiḥ --- dṛśyasya prāguktalakṣaṇasya ya ātmā yat svarūpaṃ tadartha eva|
tasya puruṣārthabhoktṛtvasampādanaṃ nāma svārthaparihāreṇa proyojanam| na hi
pradhānaṃ pravartamānamātmanaḥ kiñcit prayojanamapekṣya pravartate kintu
śuddhatvāt sarve draṣṭāro bandharahitāḥ syuḥ| tataśca saṃsāroccheda
puruṣaṃ prati tannaṣṭaṃ viratavyāpāraṃ tathāpi sarvapuruṣasādhāraṇatvādanyān
kadācidapi vināśaḥ| ekasya muktau vā na sarvamuktiprasaṅga ityuktaṃ bhavati
vyavasthitayoryā svarūpopalabdhistasyāḥ kāraṇaṃ yaḥ sa saṃyogaḥ| sa ca
tayornityayorvyāpakayoḥ svarūpādatiriktaḥ kaścit saṃyogaḥ| yadeva bhogyasya
bhogyatvaṃ bhoktuśca bhoktṛtvamanādisiddhaṃ sa eva saṃyogaḥ ||23||
vṛttiḥ --- yā pūrvaṃ viparyāsātmikā moharūpā+avidyā vyākhyātā (2|4-5) sā
vivekakhyātavavivekanimittaḥ saṃyogaḥ svayameva nivartata iti tasya hānam|
yadeva ca saṃyogasya hānaṃ tadeva nityaṃ kevalasyāpi puruṣasya kaivalyaṃ
tadevaṃ dṛśyasaṃyogasya svarūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ cābhihitam| atha
vṛttiḥ --- anye guṇā anyaḥ puruṣa ityevaṃvidhasya vivekasya yā khyātiḥ
prakhyā sā+asya hānasya dṛśyaduḥkhaparityāgasyopāyaḥ kāraṇam| kīdṛśī|
aviplavā na vidyate viplavo vicchedo+antarā+antarā+abhyutthānarūpo yasyāḥ sā
buddherantarmukhā yā cicchāyāsaṃkrāntiḥ sā vivekakhyātirucyate| tasyāṃ ca
utpannavivekakhyāteḥ puruṣasya yādṛśī prajñā bhavati tāṃ kathayan
<note>tasya saptadhā prāntabhūmiḥ prajñā iti vā bahusammataḥ sūtrapāṭhaḥ| </note>
<item>1| jñātaṃ mayā jñeyam| jñātavyaṃ na kiñcidasti| </item>
<item>2| kṣīṇā me kleśāḥ| na kiñcit kṣetavyamasti| </item>
tasyāmavasthāyāmīdṛśyeva prajñā jāyate| īdṛśī prajñā kāryaviṣayaṃ
<item>5| caritārthā me buddhiḥ| guṇā hṛtādhikārā giriśikharanipatitā iva
vṛttiḥ --- iha kānicit samādheḥ sākṣādupakārakāṇi yathā dhāraṇādīni kānicit
vṛttiḥ --- tatra prāṇaviyogaprayojanavyāpāro hiṃsā| sā ca sarvānarthahetuḥ|
tadabhāvarūpāyā ahiṃsāyā nirdeśaḥ| satyaṃ vāṅmanasoryathārthatvam| steyaṃ
sarvāsu kṣiptādiṣu cittabhūmiṣu bhavā mahāvratamityucyate| tadyathā ---
brāhmaṇaṃ na haniṣyāmi tīrthe na kaṃcana haniṣyāmi caturdaśyāṃ na haniṣyāmi
itthamaniyatīkṛtāḥ sāmānyenaiva pravṛttā mahāvratamityucyate na punaḥ
vṛttiḥ --- śaucaṃ dvividham --- bāhyamābhyantaraṃ ca| bāhyaṃ mṛjjalādibhiḥ
santoṣastuṣṭiḥ| śeṣāḥ prāgeva (2|1) kṛtavyākhyānāḥ| ete śaucādayo
vṛttiḥ --- vitarkyante iti vitarkā yogaparipanthino hiṃsādayaḥ| teṣāṃ
pratipakṣabhāvane sati yadā bādhā bhavati tadā yogaḥ sukaro bhavatīti
idānīṃ vitarkāṇāṃ svarūpaṃ bhedaprakāraṃ phalaṃ ca krameṇāha ---
vṛttiḥ --- ete pūrvoktā hiṃsādayaḥ prathamaṃ tridhā bhidyante
kṛtakāritānumodanabhedena| tatra svayaṃ niṣpāditāḥ kṛtāḥ| kuru kurviti
prayojakavyāpāreṇa samutpāditāḥ kāritāḥ| anyena kriyamāṇāḥ sādhvityaṅgīkṛtā
anyathā mandamatirevaṃ manyeta na mayā svayaṃ hiṃsā kṛteti nāsti me doṣaḥ|
eteṣāṃ kāraṇapratipādanāya lobhakrodhamohapūrvakā iti| yadyapi lobhaḥ
kṛtādibhedena triprakārā api hiṃsādayo mohādikāraṇatvena tridhā bhidyante|
mandāḥ na tīvrā nāpi madhyāḥ| madhyā nāpi mandā nāpi tīvrāḥ|
adhimātrāstīvrāḥ| pāścāttyā navabhedāḥ| itthaṃ traividhye sati
mṛdumṛdurmṛdumadhyo mṛdutīvra iti| eṣāṃ phalamāha --- duḥkhājñānānantaphalā
saṃśayaviparyayarūpam| te duḥkhājñāne+anantamaparicchinnaṃ phalaṃ yeṣāṃ te
tathoktāḥ| itthaṃ teṣāṃ svarūpakāraṇādibhedena jñātānāṃ pratipakṣabhāvanayā
bhavati| hiṃsrasvabhāvā api hiṃsāṃ tyajantītyarthaḥ <note>pā0 hiṃsrā api
vṛttiḥ --- kriyamāṇā hi kriyā yāgādikāḥ phalaṃ svargādikaṃ prayacchanti|
tasya tu satyābhyāsavato yoginastathā satyaṃ prakṛṣyate yathā
vṛttiḥ --- kathamityasya bhāvaḥ kathantā| janmanaḥ kathantā janmakathantā|
tasyāḥ sambodhaḥ samyagjñānaṃ janmāntare ko+ahamāsaṃ kīdṛśaḥ kiṃkāryakārīti
jijñāsāyāṃ sarvameva samyagjānātītyarthaḥ| na kevalaṃ bhogasādhanaparigraha
kāyo nātrāgrahaḥ kārya iti| amunaiva hetunā parairanyaiśca
svameva kāyaṃ jugupsate tattadavadyadarśanāt sa kathaṃ
vṛttiḥ --- bhavantīti vākyaśeṣaḥ| sattvaṃ prakāśasukhādyātmakaṃ tasya śuddhī
cittasya yogyatvaṃ samarthatvam| śaucābhyāsavata eva ete sattvaśuddhyādayaḥ
yasya bāhyaṃ viṣayasukhaṃ śatāṃśenāpi na samam ||42||
iṣṭayā+abhipretayā devatayā samprayogo bhavati| sā devatā pratyakṣā
samādheruktalakṣaṇasyāvirbhāvo bhavati yasmāt sa bhagavānīśvaraḥ prasannaḥ
sthiraṃ niṣkampaṃ sukhamanudvejanīyaṃ ca bhavati tadā yogāṅgatāṃ bhajate
sukhaṃ bhavatīti sambandhaḥ| yadā yadā+a+asanaṃ badhnāmīti icchāṃ karoti
duḥkhajanakaṃ bhavati| asmiṃścāsanajaye sati samādhyantarāyabhūtā na
tasyaiva sukhāvagamāya vibhajya svarūpaṃ kathayati --- sa tu
vṛttiḥ --- bāhyavṛttiḥ śvāso recakaḥ| antarvṛttiḥ praśvāsaḥ pūrakaḥ|
āntarastambhavṛttiḥ kumbhakaḥ| tasmin jalamiva kumbhe niścalatayā prāṇā
avasthāpyanta iti kumbhakaḥ| trividho+ayaṃ prāṇāyāmaḥ deśena kālena
saṃkhyayā copalakṣito dīrghasūkṣmasaṃjño bhavati| deśopalakṣito yathā
yathā ṣaṭtriṃśanmātrādipramāṇaḥ| saṃkhyayopalakṣito yathā iyato vārān kṛta
etāvadbhiḥ śvāsapraśvāsaiḥ prathama udghāto bhavatīti| etajjñānāya
saṃkhyāgrahaṇamupāttam| udghāto nāma nābhimūlāt preritasya vāyoḥ
vṛttiḥ --- prāṇasya bāhyo viṣayo nāsāddvādaśāntādiḥ| ābhyantaro viṣayo
hṛdayanābhicakrādiḥ| tau dvau viṣayāvākṣipya paryālocya yaḥ stambharūpī
gativicchedaḥ sa caturthaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ| tṛtīyasmāt kumbhakākhyādayamasya
niṣpadyate</note>| asya tu viṣayadvayākṣepako nirodhaḥ| ayamapi
vṛttiḥ --- dhāraṇā vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇāstāsu prāṇāyāmaiḥ kṣīṇadoṣaṃ mano yatra
yatra dhāryate tatra tatra sthirībhavati na vikṣepaṃ bhajate ||53||
ca kathaṃ niṣpadyata ityāha --- cakṣurādīnāmindriyāṇāṃ svaviṣayo rūpādistena
pratīyante| ataścittanirodhe tāni pratyāhṛtāni bhavanti| teṣāṃ
sampadyante yathā bāhyaviṣayābhimukhatāṃ nīyamānānyapi na yāntītyarthaḥ
kriyāyogamabhidhāya kleśānāmuddeśaṃ svarūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ kṣetraṃ phalaṃ coktvā
karmaṇāmapi bhedaṃ kāraṇaṃ svarūpaṃ phalaṃ cābhidhāya vipākasya kāraṇam
yat sthirīkaraṇaṃ sā cittasya dhāraṇocyate| ayamarthaḥ ---
jitadvandvena yoginā nāsāgrādau samprajñātasya samādherabhyāsāya cittasya
vṛttiḥ --- tatra tasmin pradeśe yatra cittaṃ dhṛtaṃ tatra pratyayasya
samādhirityucyate| samyagādhīyata ekāgrīkriyate vikṣepān parihṛtya mano
cittavṛttiṣu viniyogaḥ kartavyaḥ| adharāmadharāṃ cittabhūmiṃ jitāṃ jitāṃ
sādhanapāde yogāṅgānyaṣṭāvuddiśya pañcānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vidhāya trayāṇāṃ kathaṃ
yau janitau saṃskārau tayoryathākramam abhibhavaprādurbhāvau yadā bhavataḥ|
cittasyobhayakṣaṇavṛttitvādanvayo yaḥ sa nirodhapariṇāma ucyate| ayamarthaḥ
vyavahriyate| calatvādguṇavṛttasya yadyapi cetaso niścalatvaṃ nāsti
samādhipariṇāma ityucyate| pūrvasmāt pariṇāmādasyāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ --- tatra
vṛttiḥ --- śāntā ye kṛtasvasvavyāpārā atīte+adhvani anupraviṣṭāḥ| uditā ya
avyapadeśyā ye śaktirūpeṇa sthitā vyapadeṣṭuṃ na śakyante| teṣāṃ yathāsvaṃ
jñāpakaṃ bhavati| ayamarthaḥ --- yo+ayaṃ niyataḥ kramo
mṛccūrṇānmṛtpiṇḍastataḥ kapālāni tebhyaśca ghaṭa ityevaṃ kramarūpaḥ
pariṇāmānyatve gamako+avagantavyaḥ| sarva eva bhāvā niyatenaiva krameṇa
pratikṣaṇaṃ pariṇamyamānāḥ paridṛśyante| ataḥ siddhaṃ kramānyatvāt
samādherbhavati| idamatra tātparyam --- asmin dharmiṇyayaṃ dharma idaṃ
saṃyamaṃ karoti tadā yatkiṃcidanutpannamatikrāntaṃ vā tat sarvaṃ yogī
artho jātiguṇakriyādiḥ| pratyayo jñānaṃ viṣayākārā buddhivṛttiḥ| eṣāṃ
kaścidgolakṣaṇamarthaṃ gotvajātyavacchinnaṃ sāsnādimat piṇḍarūpaṃ śabdaṃ ca
tadvācakaṃ jñānaṃ ca tadgrāhakamabhedenaivādhyavasyati na tvasya gośabdo
vācako+ayaṃ gośabdasya vācyastayoridaṃ grāhakaṃ jñānamiti bhedena
vyavaharati| tathāhi --- ko+ayamarthaḥ ko+ayaṃ śabdaḥ kimidaṃ jñānamiti
pṛṣṭaḥ sarvatraikarūpamevottaraṃ dadāti gauriti| sa yadyekarūpatāṃ na
yo+ayaṃ <note>pā0 ekasmin viṣaye yo+ayam| etasmin sthite yo+ayam vā</note>
pravibhāga idaṃ śabdasya tattvaṃ yadvācakatvaṃ nāma idamarthasya
yadvācyatvamidaṃ jñānasya yat prakāśakatvamiti pravibhāgaṃ vidhāya tasmin
pravibhāge yaḥ saṃyamaṃ karoti tasya sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ
anenaivābhiprāyeṇa tena prāṇināyaṃ śabdaḥ samuccārita iti sarvaṃ jānāti
dharmādharmākhyāḥ| teṣu saṃskāreṣu yadā saṃyamaṃ karoti evaṃ mayā
so+artho+anubhūta evaṃ mayā sā kriyā niṣpāditeti pūrvavṛttamanusandadhāno
yadā saṃyamaṃ karoti tadā parakīyacittasya jñānamutpadyate sarāgamasya
cittaṃ vītarāgaṃ veti| paracittagatān sarvānapi dharmān jānātītyarthaḥ
vṛttiḥ --- tasya parasya yaccittaṃ tat sālambanaṃ svakīyenā+a+alambanena
sahitaṃ na śakyate jñātumālambanasya kenacilliṅgenāviṣayīkṛtatvāt| liṅgāddhi
cittamātraṃ parasyāvagataṃ na tu nīlaviṣayamasya cittaṃ pītaviṣayamiti vā|
yacca na gṛhītaṃ tatra saṃyamasya kartumaśakyatvānna bhavati paracittasya yo
viṣayastatra jñānam| tasmāt parakīyacittaṃ nā+a+alambanasahitaṃ gṛhyate
tasyā+a+alambanasyā+agṛhītatvāt| cittadharmāḥ punargṛhyanta eva| yadā tu
vṛttiḥ --- kāyaḥ śarīraṃ tasya rūpaṃ cakṣurgrāhyo guṇastasminnastyasmin kāye
rūpamiti saṃyamāttasya rūpasya cakṣurgrāhyatvarūpā yā śaktistasyāḥ stambhe
bhavati| na kenacidasau dṛśyata ityarthaḥ| etenaiva
vṛttiḥ --- āyurvipākaṃ yat pūrvakṛtaṃ karma taddviprakāraṃ sopakramaṃ
nirupakramaṃ ca| tatra sopakramaṃ yat phalajananāya sahopakrameṇa
saṃvartitamanuṣṇapradeśe cireṇa śuṣyati| tasmin dvividhe karmaṇi yaḥ
saṃyamaṃ karoti --- kiṃ mama karma śīghravipākaṃ ciravipākaṃ vā --- evaṃ
bhaviṣyatīti niḥsaṃśayaṃ jānāti| ariṣṭebhyo vā| ariṣṭāni trividhāni|
prakarṣaṃ gacchanti yathā sarvasya mitratvādikamay+aṃ pratipadyate
siṃhavīrye vā tanmayībhāvenā+ayaṃ saṃyamaṃ karoti tattatsāmarthyayuktaṃ
vṛttiḥ --- pravṛttirviṣayavatī jyotiṣmatī ca prāguktā (1|35-36)| tasyā ya
ālokaḥ sāttvikaprakāśastasya nikhileṣu viṣayeṣu nyāsāt tadvāsitānāṃ
viṣayāṇāṃ bhāvanātaḥ santaḥkaraṇeṣu indriyeṣu ca prakṛṣṭaśaktimāpanneṣu
vṛttiḥ --- sūrye prakāśamaye yaḥ saṃyamaḥ karoti tasya saptasu
bhūrbhuvaḥsvaḥprabhṛtiṣu lokeṣu yāni bhuvanāni tattatsanniveśabhāñji purāṇi
sūtre sāttvikaprakāśa ālambanatayoktaḥ| iha tu bhautika iti viśeṣaḥ
vṛttiḥ --- tārāṇāṃ jyotiṣāṃ yo vyūho viśiṣṭaḥ sanniveśastasya candre
vṛttiḥ --- dhruve niścale jyotiṣāṃ pradhāne kṛtasaṃyamasya tāsāṃ tārāṇāṃ yā
gatiḥ pratyekaṃ niyatakālā niyatadeśā ca tasyā jñānamutpadyate --- iyaṃ
tārā+ayaṃ graha iyatā kālenā+amuṃ rāśimidaṃ nakṣatraṃ yāsyatīti sarvaṃ
vṛttiḥ --- śarīramadhyavarti nābhisaṃjñakaṃ yat ṣoḍaśāraṃ cakraṃ tasmin
bhavati --- nābhicakraṃ śarīramadhyavarti sarvataḥ prasṛtānāṃ nāḍyādīnāṃ
vṛttiḥ --- kaṇṭhe gale kūpaḥ kaṇṭhakūpaḥ| jihvāmūle jihvātantoradhastāt kūpa
prādurbhavanti tasmin kṛtasaṃyamasya yoginaḥ kṣutpipāsādayo nivartante|
ghaṇṭikādhastāt srotasā dhāryamāṇe tasmin bhāvite bhavatyevaṃvidhā siddhiḥ
bhavatītyarthaḥ| yadi vā kāyasya sthairyamutpadyate na kenacit spandayituṃ
yathā gṛhābhyantarasthasya maṇeḥ prasarantī prabhā kuñcitākāreva
sarvapradeśe saṃghaṭate tathā hṛdayasthaḥ sāttvikaḥ prakāśaḥ prasṛtastatra
puruṣāsteṣāmitaraprāṇibhiradṛśyānām tasya darśanaṃ bhavati| tān paśyati
kriyamāṇe prātibhaṃ vivekakhyāteḥ pūrvabhāvi tārakaṃ jñānamudeti|
yathodeṣyataḥ savituḥ pūrvaṃ prabhā prādurbhavati tadvadvivekakhyāteḥ pūrvaṃ
tārakaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ jñānamutpadyate| tasmin sati saṃyamāntarānapekṣaḥ
yā sukhaduḥkhasaṃvit sa bhogaḥ| sattvasya svārthanairapekṣyeṇa parārthaḥ
puruṣaviṣayaṃ jñānamutpadyate| tatra tadevaṃ rūpaṃ svālambanaṃ jñānaṃ
na punaḥ puruṣo jñātā jñānasya viṣayabhāvamāpadyate
tatra prātibhaṃ pūrvoktaṃ jñānaṃ tasyāvirbhavanāt sūkṣmādikamarthaṃ paśyati|
śrāvaṇaṃ śrotrendriyajaṃ jñānaṃ tasmācca prakṛṣṭaṃ divyaṃ śabdaṃ jānāti|
vedanā sparśendriyajaṃ jñānaṃ vedyate+anayeti kṛtvā tāntrikyā saṃjñayā
kṛtvā tasya prakarṣāddivyaṃ rūpajñānamutpadyate| āsvādo rasanendriyajaṃ
jñānam| āsvādyate+aneneti kṛtvā tasmin prakṛṣṭe divye rase saṃvidupajāyate|
vārtā gandhasaṃvit| vṛttiśabdena tāntrikyā paribhāṣayā ghrāṇendriyamucyate|
vartate gandhaviṣaye iti vṛtterghrāṇendriyājjātā vārtā gandhasaṃvit| tasyāṃ
vṛttiḥ --- te prākpratipāditāḥ phalaviśeṣāḥ samādheḥ prakarṣe gacchata
upasargā upadravā vighnāḥ| tatra harṣasmayādikaraṇena <note> pā0
bhoktṛbhogyabhāvena yat saṃvedanamupajāyate sa eva śarīrabandha ityucyate|
tānavamāpadyate| cittasya ca yo+asau pracāro hṛdayapraveśādindriyadvāreṇa
viṣayābhimukhyena prasarastasya saṃvedanaṃ jñānam --- iyaṃ cittavahā nāḍī|
anayā cittaṃ vahati| iyaṃ ca prāṇādivahābhyo <note> pā0 rasaprāṇādivahābhyo
</note> nāḍībhyo vilakṣaṇeti --- svaparaśarīrayoryadā saṃcāraṃ jānāti tadā
parakīyaṃ mṛtaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ vā cittasañcāradvāreṇa praviśati| cittaṃ ca
paraśarīrapraviṣṭo yogī svaśārīravat tena sarvaṃ vyavaharati| yato
vyāpakayościttapuruṣayorbhogasaṅkoce kāraṇaṃ karma taccet samādhinā kṣiptaṃ
hṛdayānmukhanāsikādvāreṇa vāyoḥ prāyaṇāt prāṇa ityucyate| nābhideśāt
sarvaśarīravyāpī vyānaḥ| tatrodānasya saṃyamadvāreṇa jayāditareṣāṃ vāyūnāṃ
rodhādūrdhvagatitvena jale mahānadyādau mahati vā kardame tīkṣṇeṣu kaṇṭakeṣu
vā na majjatyatilaghutvāt <note> pā0 na sajjate|tilaghutvāt </note>|
kṛtasaṃyamasya yogino divyaṃ śrotraṃ pravartate| yugapat
sambandhastatra saṃyamaṃ vidhāya laghuni tūlādau samāpattiṃ
tanmayībhāvalakṣaṇāṃ vidhāya prāptātilaghubhāvo yogī prathamaṃ yathāruci
vṛttiḥ --- śarīrādbahiryā manasaḥ śarīranairapekṣyeṇa vṛttiḥ sā mahāvidehā
</note> ucyate| tatastasyāṃ kṛtāt saṃyamāt prakāśāvaraṇakṣayaḥ sāttvikasya
cittasya yaḥ prakāśaḥ tasya yadāvaraṇaṃ kleśakarmādi tasya kṣayaḥ pravilayo
bhavati| ayamarthaḥ --- śarīrāhaṃkāre sati yā manaso bahirvṛttiḥ sā
kalpitetyucyate| yadā punaḥ śarīrādahaṃkārabhāvaṃ parityajya svātantryeṇa
manaso vṛttiḥ sā+akalpitā| tasyāṃ saṃyamādyoginaḥ sarve cittamalāḥ kṣīyante
vṛttiḥ --- pañcānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ bhūtānāṃ ye pañcā+avasthāviśeṣarūpā dharmāḥ
sthūlatvādayastatra kṛtasaṃyamasya bhūtajayo bhavati| bhūtānyasya vaśyāni
bhavantītyarthaḥ| tathā hi --- bhūtānāṃ paridṛśyamānaṃ viśiṣṭākāravat
arthavattvaṃ teṣu eva guṇeṣu bhogāpavargasampādanākhyā śaktiḥ| tadevaṃ
kurvan yogī bhūtajayī bhavati| tadyathā --- prathamaṃ sthūlarūpe saṃyamaṃ
vidhāya tadanu svarūpe ityevaṃ krameṇa tasya kṛtasaṃyamasya
saṃkalpānuvidhāyinyo vatsānusāriṇya iva gāvo bhūtaprakṛtayo bhavantītyarthaḥ
<item> 9| yatrakāmāvasāyo yasmin viṣaye+asya kāmaḥ svecchā bhavati
tasmin viṣaye yogino+adhyavasāyo bhavati| taṃ viṣayaṃ
yathā paramāṇutvaṃ prāpto vajrādīnāmapyantaḥ praviśati| evaṃ sarvatra
yojyam| ete+aṇimādayo+aṣṭau guṇā mahāsiddhaya ucyante| kāyasampadvakṣyamāṇā
(3|46) tāṃ prāpnoti| taddharmā+anabhighātaśca tasya kāyasya ye dharmā
rūpādayasteṣāmanabhighāto nāśo na kutaścidbhavati nāsya rūpamagnirdahati na
saṃhatirasya śarīre bhavatītyarthaḥ| iti kāyasya āvirbhūtaguṇasampat
eteṣāṃ indriyāṇāmavasthāpañcake pūrvavat saṃyamaṃ kṛtvendriyajayī bhavati
pradhānajayaḥ| etāḥ siddhyayo jitendriyasya prādurbhavanti| tāścāsmin śāstre
madhupratīkā ityucyante| yathā madhuna ekadeśo+api svadata evaṃ
vṛttiḥ --- tasmin buddheḥ sāttvike pariṇāme kṛtasaṃyamasya yā
sarvajñātṛtvam| eṣāṃ cāsmiñchāstre parasyāṃ vaśīkārasaṃjñāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ
vṛttiḥ --- tasyāmapi viśokāyāṃ siddhau yadā vairāgyamutpadyate yoginastadā
madhumatīsaṃjñāṃ bhūmikāṃ sākṣātkurvataḥ svāmino devā upanimantrayitāro
upaḍhaukayantīti tasminnupanimantraṇe nā+anena saṅgaḥ kartavyo nāpi smayaḥ|
manyamāno na samādhāvutsahate| ataḥ saṅgasmayayostena varjanaṃ kartavyam
vṛttiḥ --- kṣaṇaḥ sarvāntyaḥ kālāvayavo yasya kalāḥ prabhavituṃ na śakyante|
tathāvidhānāṃ kālakṣaṇānāṃ yaḥ kramaḥ paurvāparyeṇa pariṇāmastatra saṃyamāt
prāguktaṃ vivekajaṃ jñānamutpadyate| ayamarthaḥ --- ayaṃ kālakṣaṇo+amuṣmāt
kvacidbhedaheturjātiḥ| yathā gauriyaṃ mahiṣīyamiti| jātyā tulyayorlakṣaṇaṃ
punarbhedo+avadhārayituṃ na śakyate yathā ekadeśasthitayoḥ śuklayoḥ
pārthivayoḥ paramāṇvostathāvidhe viṣaye bhedāya kṛtasaṃyamasya bhedena
jñānamutpadyate tadā tadabhyāsāt sūkṣmāṇyapi tattvāni bhedena pratipadyate|
etaduktaṃ bhavati --- yatra kenacidupāyena bhedo nāvadhārayituṃ śakyastatra
tārakamityucyate| asya viṣayamāha --- sarvaviṣayamiti| sarvāṇi tattvāni
śuddhiḥ| puruṣasya śuddhirupacaritabhogābhāva iti dvayoḥ samānāyāṃ śuddhau
atha kaivalyapādaḥ yadājñayaiva kaivalyaṃ vinopāyaiḥ prajāyate|
nanu nandīśvarādikānāṃ jātyādipariṇāmo+asminneva janmani dṛśyate| tat kathaṃ
prakṛtyāpūrāt| pāścāttyā eva hi prakṛtayo+amuṣmiñjanmani vikārānāpūrayanti
vṛttiḥ --- nimittaṃ dharmādi| tat prakṛtīnāmarthāntarapariṇāme na prayojakam|
na hi kāryeṇa kāraṇaṃ pravartate| kutra tarhi tasya dharmādervyāpāra ityāha
virodhitvādbhedaḥ kṣayaḥ kriyate| tasmin pratibandhake kṣīṇe prakṛtayaḥ
svayameva prasaradrūpaṃ pariṇāmaṃ gṛhṇāti na tu jalaprasaraṇe tasya kaścit
yugapadanekaśarīranirmitsā jāyate tadā kutastāni cittāni prabhavantītyāha
vṛttiḥ --- yoginaḥ svayaṃ nirmiteṣu kāyeṣu yāni cittāni tāni
yoginaścittaṃ prayojakaṃ prerakamadhiṣṭhātṛtvena| tena na bhinnamatatvam|
vṛttiḥ --- dhyānajaṃ samādhijaṃ yaccittaṃ tat pañcasu madhye+anāśayaṃ
vṛttiḥ --- śubhaphaladaṃ karma yāgādi śuklam| aśubhaphaladaṃ brahmahatyādi
kṛṣṇam| ubhayasaṃkīrṇaṃ śuklakṛṣṇam| tatra śuklaṃ karma vicakṣaṇānāṃ
dānatapaḥsvādhyāyādimatāṃ puruṣāṇām| kṛṣṇaṃ karma dānavānām <note> nārakānām
yena karmaṇā yādṛk śarīramārabdhaṃ devamanuṣyatiryagādibhedena tasya
bhavati| ayamarthaḥ --- yena karmaṇā pūrvaṃ devatādiśarīramārabdhaṃ
eva smṛtiphalā vāsanāḥ prakaṭībhavanti| lokāntareṣvevārtheṣu tasya
smṛtyādayo jāyante| itarāstu satyo+api avyaktasaṃjñāstiṣṭhanti na tasyāṃ
vṛttiḥ --- iha nānāyoniṣu bhramatāṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ kāṃcidyonimanubhūya yadā
yonyantarasahasravyavadhānena punastāmeva yoniṃ pratipadyate tadā tasyāṃ
karmaṇaścittasattve vāsanārūpaḥ saṃskāraḥ samutpadyate| sa ca
svarganarakādīnāṃ phalānāṃ cāṅkurībhāvaḥ karmaṇāṃ vā yāgādīnāṃ
punarapi saṃskārasmṛtyādayaḥ| evaṃ ca yasya smṛtisaṃskārādayo
yadānubhava eva saṃskārībhavati saṃskāraśca smṛtirūpatayā pariṇamate
pravartate tadā kiṃ vāsanānimitta uta nirnimitta iti śaṅkāṃ vyapanetumāha
vṛttiḥ --- tāsāṃ vāsanānāmanāditvam| na vidyata ādiryasya tasya bhāvastattvaṃ
tāsāmādirnāstītyarthaḥ| kuta iti| āśiṣo nityatvāt| yeyamāśīrmahāmoharūpā
sadaiva sukhasādhanāni me bhūyāsurmā kadācana tairme viyogo bhūditi yaḥ
pravṛttiḥ kena vāryate| anubhavasaṃskārānubiddhaṃ saṃkocavikāśadharmi cittaṃ
rāgādayasteṣāmavidyeti sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa hetuḥ| phalaṃ śarīrādi smṛtyādi
ca| āśrayo buddhisattvam| ālambanaṃ yadevānubhavasya tadeva vāsanānām|
vāsanāḥ prarohanti na kāryamārabhanta iti tāsāmabhāvaḥ ||11||
sattvasambandhāyogāt| na hi śaśaviṣāṇādīnāṃ kvacidapi sattvasambandho
dṛṣṭaḥ| nirupākhye ca kārye kimuddiśya kāraṇāni pravarteran| na hyasantaṃ
viṣayamālocya kaścit pravartate| satāmapi virodhānnābhāvasambandho+asti| yat
svarūpaṃ labdhasattākaṃ tat kathaṃ nirupākhyatāmabhāvarūpatāṃ vā bhajate na
traikālikatvena tatra vyavasthitāḥ svasmin svasminnadhvani vyavasthitāḥ na
svarūpaṃ tyajanti| vartamāne+adhvani vyavasthitāḥ kevalaṃ bhogyatāṃ
vṛttiḥ --- ya ete dharmadharmiṇaḥ proktāste vyaktasūkṣmabhedena vyavasthitāḥ
yadyadanvayi tattat pariṇāmarūpaṃ dṛṣṭam| yathā ghaṭādayo mṛdanvitā
yadyete trayo guṇāḥ sarvatra mūlakāraṇaṃ kathameko dharmīti vyapadeśa
pariṇāmaḥ kvacit sattvamaṅgi kvacidrajaḥ kvacicca tama
nanu jñānavyatirikte satyarthe vastvekamanekaṃ vā vaktuṃ yujyate| yadā ca
vijñānameva vāsanāvaśāt kāryakāraṇabhāvenāvasthitaṃ tathā tathā pratibhāti
vṛttiḥ --- tayorjñānārthayorviviktaḥ panthā vivikto mārgo deśa iti yāvat|
katham| vastusāmye cittabhedāt| samāne vastuni stryādāvupalabhyamāne
tathāhi ekasyāṃ rūpalāvaṇyavatyāṃ yoṣiti upalabhyamānāyāṃ sarāgasya
cittasya tadvastu kāryaṃ tasminnarthāntaravyāsakte tadvastu na kiñcit syāt|
bhavatviti cenna| tadeva kathamanyairbahubhirupalabhyeta| upalabhyate ca
tasmānna cittakāryam| atha yugapadbahubhiḥ so+arthaḥ kriyate tadā
neṣyate tadā kāraṇabhede sati kāryabhedasyābhāve nirhetukamekarūpaṃ vā jagat
syāt| etaduktaṃ bhavati --- satyapi bhinne kāraṇe yadi kāryasyābhedastadā
svātantryeṇa nirhetukaṃ vā syāt| yadyevaṃ kathaṃ tena triguṇātmanā
tena rūpeṇābhivyaktiḥ| tathā ca --- kāmukasya sannihitāyāṃ yoṣiti
dharmasahakṛtaṃ cittaṃ sattvasyāṅgitayā pariṇamamānaṃ sukhamayaṃ bhavati|
prakāśyatvādgrāhyasvabhāvastadā yugapat sarvānarthān kathaṃ na gṛhṇāti| na
ca bhavati| ayamarthaḥ --- sarvaḥ padārtha ātmalābhe cittaṃ
kṛtastamevārthaṃ tajjñānaṃ vyavahārayogyatāṃ nayati| tataḥ so+artho jñāta
ucyate| yena cā+a+akāro na samarpitaḥ sa na jñātatvena vyavahriyate|
pratipadyate tasminnevārthe smṛtirupajāyata iti na sarvatra jñānaṃ nāpi
yadyevaṃ pramātāpi puruṣo yasmin kāle nīlaṃ vedayate na tasmin kāle
tāstatprabhościttasya grahītuḥ puruṣasya sadā sarvakālameva jñātāḥ <note>pā0
pariṇāmitvābhāvādityarthaḥ| yadyasau pariṇāmī syāt tadā pariṇāmasya
kādācitkatvāt tāsāṃ cittavṛttīnāṃ sadā jñātatvaṃ nopapadyeta| ayamarthaḥ ---
vṛttiḥ --- taccittaṃ svābhāsaṃ svaprakāśakaṃ na bhavati puruṣavedyaṃ
bhavatīti yāvat| kutaḥ| dṛśyatvāt| yat kila dṛśyaṃ tat draṣṭṛvedyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ
yathā ghaṭādi| dṛśyaṃ ca cittaṃ tasmānna svābhāsam ||18||
tathāhi --- kruddho+ahaṃ bhīto+ahamatra me rāga ityevamādyā saṃvit
vyāpāradvayamarthapratyakṣakāle na yugapat kartuṃ śakyaṃ virodhāt| na hi
viruddhayorvyāpārayoryugapat sambhavo+asti| ata ekasmin kāla ubhayasya
nanu mā bhūdbuddheḥ svayaṃ grahaṇaṃ buddhyantareṇa bhaviṣyatītyāśaṅkyāha
vṛttiḥ --- yadi hi buddhirbuddhyantareṇa vedyate sā+api buddhiḥ svayamabuddhā
buddhyantaraṃ prakāśayitumasamartheti tasyā grāhakaṃ <note> pā0 bodhakam
puruṣāntareṇārthapratītirna syāt| na hi pratītavapratītāyāmarthaḥ pratīto
bhavati| smṛtisaṃkaraśca prāpnoti --- rūpe rase vā samutpannāyāṃ buddhau
yugapadbahvayaḥ smṛtayaḥ kriyante tadā buddheraparyavasānādbuddhismṛtīnāṃ ca
smṛtīnāṃ saṃkaraḥ syāt| iyaṃ rūpe smṛtiriyaṃ rase smṛtiriti na jñāyeta
pratisakramo+anyatra gamanaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā| anyenāsaṅkīrṇeti yāvat|
yathā guṇā aṅgāṅgibhāvalakṣaṇe pariṇāme aṅginaṃ guṇaṃ saṃkrāmanti
tadrūpatāmivā+a+apadyante| yathā vā loke paramāṇavaḥ prasaranto
dṛśyoparaktaṃ viṣayoparaktaṃ gṛhītaviṣayākārapariṇāmaṃ yadā bhavati tadā
tadeva cittaṃ sarvārthagrahaṇasamarthaṃ bhavati| yathā nirmalaṃ
sattvasyābhivyaṅgyamabhivyajyate caitanyam| ata evāsmindarśane dve cicchaktī
iti| nanu pratibimbaṃ nāma nirmalasya niyatapariṇāmasya nirmale dṛṣṭam|
yathā mukhasya darpaṇe| atyantanirmalasya vyāpakasyāpariṇāminaḥ puruṣasya
pratisaṃkrāntidarśanāt| evaṃ sati na kācidanupapattiḥ pratibimbadarśanasya|
sukhaduḥkharūpo bhoga ityuktam tadanupapannam| tadeva cittasattvaṃ
prakṛtāvapariṇatāyāṃ kathaṃ sambhavati kimarthaśca tasyāḥ pariṇāmaḥ|
tadeva puruṣārthakartavyatocyate| sā ca śaktiracetanāyā api prakṛteḥ
punaḥ pariṇāmamārabhate| evaṃvidhāyāṃ ca puruṣārthakartavyatāyāṃ jaḍāyā api
prakṛterna kācidanupapattiḥ| nanu yadīdṛśī śaktiḥ sahajaiva pradhānasyāsti
tat kimarthaṃ mokṣārthibhirmokṣāya yatnaḥ kriyate| mokṣasya cānarthanīyatve
abhidhīyate </note>| sa ca mokṣāya prayatamāna evaṃvidhaśāstropadeśaṃ
sahakāriṇamapekṣya mokṣākhyaṃ phalamāsādayati| sarvāṇyeva kāryāṇi prāptāyāṃ
prakārāntareṇānupapatteḥ| atastāṃ vinā kathaṃ bhavitumarhati| ataḥ
viṣayaniścayadvāreṇa samagrāṃ lokayātrāṃ nirvāhayatīti| evaṃvidhameva cittaṃ
paśyanto bhrāntāḥ svasaṃvedanaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ ca jagadityevaṃ bruvāṇāḥ
kutaḥ| saṃhatyakāritvāt saṃhatya sambhūya militvā+arthakriyākāritvāt| yacca
saṃhatyārthakriyākāri tat parārthaṃ dṛṣṭam| yathā śayanāsanādi|
parārthāni| yaḥ paraḥ sa puruṣaḥ| nanu yādṛśena śayanāsanādīnāṃ pareṇa
śarīravatā pārārthyamupalabdhaṃ taddṛṣṭāntabalena tādṛśa eva paraḥ sidhyati|
eva bhoktā paraḥ sidhyati| yathā candanāvṛte śikhariṇi
paraścinmātrarūpo+asaṃhataḥ sidhyati| yadi ca tasya paratvaṃ
sarvotkṛṣṭatvamevaṃ pratīyate tathāpi tāmasebhyo viṣayebhyaḥ prakṛṣyate
tato+api prakṛṣṭaṃ sattvaṃ prakāśarūpam| tasyāpi yaḥ prakāśakaḥ
prakāśyavilakṣaṇaḥ sa cidrūpa eva <note>pā0 iva</note> bhavatīti kutastasya
yā+a+atmabhāvabhāvanā sā nivartate| cittameva kartṛ jñātṛ bhoktrityabhimāno
vṛttiḥ --- tasmin samādhau sthitasya chidreṣvantarāyeṣu yāni pratyayāntarāṇi
saṃskārāṇāmapi kartavyam| yathā te jñānāgninā pluṣṭā dagdhabījakalpā na
punaścittabhūmau prarohaṃ labhante tathā saṃskārā api ||27||
evaṃ ca pratyayāntarāntarānudaye sthirībhūte samādhau yādṛśasya yoginaḥ
gaṇanāspadaṃ bhavati| akleśenaiva sarvaṃ jñeyaṃ jānātītyarthaḥ ||30||
vṛttiḥ --- kṛto niṣpādito bhogāpavargalakṣaṇaḥ puruṣārthaḥ prayojanaṃ yaiste
yo+asau kramo vakṣyamāṇastasya parisamāptirniṣṭhā| na punarudbhava ityarthaḥ
gṛhyate sa kṣaṇānāṃ krama ucyate| na hyananubhūteṣu kramaḥ parijñātuṃ śakyaḥ
pratilomasya pariṇāmasya samāptau vikārānudbhavo yadi va

tr.td: karma tasyaiva bhoktṛtvaṃ bhavettadā hitāhitaprāptiparihārāya sarvasya
vyavahārānupapatteḥ kartā bhoktā+anusandhātā yaḥ sa ātmeti
parasparaviruddhaṃ kartuṃ śakyam| ata ekasmin samaye vyāpāradvayasya
nivṛttādhikāreṣu guṇeṣu cinmātrarūpa evātmā+avatiṣṭhat ityeva yuktam|
saṃsāradaśāyāṃ tu evambhūtasyaiva kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvamanusandhātṛtvaṃ ca
vyavahārasya niṣpatteḥ kimanyaiḥ phalgubhiḥ kalpanājalpaiḥ| yadi
pariṇāmitvāccānityatve tasyā+a+atmatvameva na syāt| yathā hyekasminneva
pariṇāmitvānnātmatvam| nāpi nityatvam| ata eva śāntabrahmavādibhiḥ
manyante teṣāṃ na yuktaḥ pakṣaḥ| tathāhi --- ānandasya sukhasvarūpatvāt
sukhasya ca sadaiva saṃvedyamānatayaiva pratibhāsāt saṃvedyamānatvaṃ ca
karmātmaparamātmabhedenātmā dvividhaḥ svīkṛtaḥ| itthaṃ ca tatra yenaiva
rūpeṇa sukhaduḥkhabhoktṛtvaṃ karmātmanastenaiva rūpeṇa yadi paramātmanaḥ
syāt| atha na tasya sākṣādbhoktṛtvaṃ kintu
kiñcāvidyāsvabhāvatve niḥsvabhāvatvāt karmātmanāṃ kaḥ śāstrādhikārī| na
jagato+aṅgīkriyamāṇe kasyāvidyeti vicāryate| na tāvat paramātmano
nama| etadevāvidyāyā avidyātvaṃ yadavicāraṇīyatvam| yaiva hi vicāreṇa
yadvastu kiñcit kāryaṃ karoti tadavaśyaṃ kutaścidbhinnamabhinnaṃ vā
tasmin satyapi yadyanirvācyatvamucyate tadā kasyacidapi vācyatvaṃ na
jñātā kartā bhokteti vyapadiśyate| mokṣadaśāyāṃ tu mithyājñānanivṛttau
teṣāmayuktaḥ pakṣaḥ| yatastasyāṃ daśāyāṃ nityatvavyāpakatvādayo guṇā
ātmatvavilakṣaṇajātiyoga iti cenna| sarvasyaiva tajjātiyogaḥ sambhavati|
cidrūpatayaiva ghaṭate nānyathā| yairapi mīmāṃsakaiḥ karmakartṛrūpa
ātmā+aṅgīkriyate teṣāmapi na yuktaḥ pakṣaḥ| tathāhi ---
ahaṃpratyayagrāhya ātmeti teṣāṃ pratijñā| ahaṃpratyaye ca kartṛtvaṃ
karmatvaṃ cātmana eva| na caitadviruddhatvādupapadyate| kartṛtvaṃ
pramātṛtvaṃ karmatvaṃ ca prameyatvam| na caitadviruddhadharmādhyāso
yugapadekasya ghaṭate| yadviruddhadharmādhyastaṃ na tadekaṃ yathā
bhāvābhāvau| viruddhe ca kartṛtvakarmatve| athocyate --- na
viṣayasānnidhye yā jñānalakṣaṇā kriyā samutpannā tasyā viṣayasaṃvittiḥ
phalam| tasyāṃ ca phalarūpāyāṃ saṃvittau svarūpaṃ prakāśarūpatayā
pratibhāsate| viṣayaśca grāhyatayā| ātmā ca grāhakatayā| ghaṭamahaṃ
jānāmītyākāreṇa tasyāḥ samutpatteḥ| kriyāyāśca kāraṇaṃ karteva
bhavatītyataḥ kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ cātmano rūpamiti| tadanupapannam|
yasmāttāsāṃ saṃvittīnāṃ sa kiṃ kartṛtvaṃ yugapat pratipadyate krameṇa
vā| yugapat kartṛtve kṣaṇāntare tasya kartṛtvaṃ na syāt| atha krameṇa
kartṛtvaṃ tadaikarūpasya na ghaṭate| ekena rūpeṇa cettasya katṛtvaṃ
tadaikasya sadaiva sannihitatvāt sarvaṃ phalamekarūpaṃ syāt| atha
nānārūpatayā tasya kartṛtvam| tadā pariṇāmitvam| pariṇāmitvācca na
pratipāditaṃ kūṭasthasya nityasya cidrūpasya tadevopapannam| etena
rūpamiti yo vicāraḥ saḥ vimarśa ityucyate| sa cāsmitāvyatirekeṇa
pratipāditā na prakāśātmanaḥ parasya puruṣasya svarūpamavagatamiti|
nayati| yacca cetanādhiṣṭhitaṃ tadeva sakalavyāpārayogyaṃ bhavati| evaṃ
ca sati nityatvāt pradhānasya vyāpāranivṛttau yadātmanaḥ

tr.td: sa pūrveṣāmapi guruḥ kālenānavacchedāt ||samādhi 26|| tasya vācakaḥ praṇavaḥ
